xwikidoc.content: {{velocity}} ## Replace the default space with the space where you want your documents to be created. ## Replace the default parent with the one of your choice and save the document. ## #set($defaultSpace = $doc.space) #set($defaultParent = $doc.fullName) {{/velocity}}
